channel.title: Rune-Evo help please
channel.description:
I recently got the rune evo source and client, it was all working fine. When I got the compiler to work, this happened.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: com/rs/Launch er : Unsupported major.minor version 52.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.launcher.LauncherHelper.checkAndLoadMain(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .
Somebody please help, I can't run the source anymore!

item.title: Rune-Evo help please
item.dc:creator: @Randomfester Randomfester
item.description:
@Randomfester wrote:

YOU ARE A LEGEND! thanks a lot, its working now

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Evo help please
item.dc:creator: @2Hdagger 2Hdagger
item.description:
@2Hdagger wrote:

You need to run it with the same version you compile it with
So just recompile and it should work

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Evo help please
item.dc:creator: @Randomfester Randomfester
item.description:
@Randomfester wrote:

Nope, nothing happened I got JDK 1.6 and changed the run.bat to 1.6.0_45 and its not working still

@echo off
title runserver
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_45\bin/java.exe" -Xmx815m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false
pause

is this right?

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Evo help please
item.dc:creator: @Randomfester Randomfester
item.description:
@Randomfester wrote:

Is there a specific version I should use?

Read full topic

item.description:

try a older version of java

item.description:
@Randomfester wrote:

I recently got the rune evo source and client, it was all working fine. When I got the compiler to work, this happened.

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: com/rs/Launch
er : Unsupported major.minor version 52.0
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
